cards.title: acceptance
cards.description: to be accepted as I am

cards.description: to have new and original ideas

cards.title: duty

cards.title: friendship

cards.title: fun

cards.title: generosity

cards.title: hope

cards.title: humility

cards.title: independence

cards.title: industry
cards.description: to work hard and well at my life tasks

cards.title: inner peace
cards.description: to experience personal peace

cards.title: justice

cards.title: knowledge
cards.description: to learn and contribute valuable knowledge

cards.title: leisure

cards.title: loved

cards.description: to give love to others

cards.title: mastery

cards.title: power

cards.title: safety
cards.description: to be safe and secure
